item.title: WATCH: Friends hold ‘admin nights’ to tackle adulting
item.description: A viral trend has spilled over into real life as groups of friends hold "admin nights,' turning administrative paperwork into a group activity.

item.title: WATCH: Corgis with the need for speed
item.description: The third-annual corgi race took place during a break in the Ohio State versus UCLA men's basketball game.

item.title: At least 39 killed after high-speed train collision in Spain, transport minister says
item.description: At least 39 people were killed and 152 more were injured after a collision between two high-speed trains in southern Spain on Sunday, according to off...

item.title: Blast at a hotel in downtown Kabul leaves multiple casualties, officials say
item.description: An explosion at a hotel in downtown Kabul has left several people dead and injured, according to officials
